attributes.action: Show all national team sports on free to view tv, to increase participation
attributes.background: I believe more access to televised sport on free to view TV will increase the numbers participating in said sports, from all backgrounds and age groups. this would benefit local clubs/teams, put more money into local economy and also aid in bettering the physical and mental health of the UK populace

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling for the list of sporting events which have to be shown on free-to-air terrestrial television to be changed to include all specific national games  if that is something you would like to see happen.
